document_data.name: Alvagaerus Firlthond
document_data.mainbody: '''Alvagaerus Firlthond''' was a [[mage]] of the [[Zhentarim]] in the late 13{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: He was taught how to create ''[[blast-globes]]'' by [[Isilger Mountrant]] during the latter's tenure as [[Magister]], between {{yearlink|1221}} and {{yearlink|1274}}. Later, he became an apprentice of [[Manshoon]] during the initial founding of the [[Zhentarim]]; his chief rival [[Sememmon]] mind-reamed the secret of the blast-globes out of him, and slew him. These secrets were traded for the latter's initial rise in rank, which happened in {{yearlink|1266}}.
